Save/Get/Reset missingness report

Source: R/report_missing.R
dump_missing_report.Rd

dump_missing_report can be used to save the missingness report to a file. get_missing_report Return the missingness report data. reset_missing_report Reset the internal missingness report data to blank.

Usage

dump_missing_report(x = "Output/variable_missing_report.csv")

get_missing_report()

reset_missing_report()

Arguments

x

File path the report will be dumped to. Default is under `Output` folder, named as `variable_missing_report.csv`.

See also

cttab report_missing

On this page
